userSkills.title: JavaScript Tutoring
userSkills.description: Learn modern JavaScript with hands-on projects. I can help with React, Vue, and Node.js applications. Perfect for beginners or those looking to level up their JS skills.

userSkills.title: Guitar Lessons
userSkills.description: Beginner to intermediate guitar lessons focusing on acoustic and electric guitar. I teach music theory, chord progressions, and popular songs.

userSkills.title: Photography Basics
userSkills.description: Learn how to take great photos with any camera. I'll teach composition, lighting, and basic editing techniques to make your photos stand out.

searchResults.title: Graphic Design
searchResults.description: Professional graphic design for logos, branding, social media, and more. I specialize in minimalist and modern design aesthetics.

searchResults.title: Spanish Language Tutoring
searchResults.description: Conversational Spanish lessons for beginners to advanced learners. Focus on practical vocabulary and real-world usage.

searchResults.title: Home Cooking Classes
searchResults.description: Learn to cook delicious home-style meals with simple ingredients. I specialize in Italian and Mediterranean cuisine.

searchResults.title: Yoga Instruction
searchResults.description: Personalized yoga instruction focusing on proper alignment and breathing techniques. Suitable for all experience levels.
